content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's my pleasure to show you my apartment. I'm sure you'll find it to be a great place to live in the center of Duisburg. How much are you thinking of offering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, Mr. Schmidt, I am a student and I am looking for a place with the lowest possible rent. I think for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment of 50 square meters, a reasonable price would be around 400 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than my expectations. The location of this apartment, in the heart of the city, and its proximity to all amenities make it quite valuable. I'm looking for a rent of at least 650 euros per month. Is that within your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I appreciate the value of your apartment. However, I am a student with a limited budget. I think a more reasonable price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center would be around 500 euros per month. It would be a great help for me if you could consider this price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 500 euros is still below my asking price. I understand that you're a student, but I also have expenses to cover. I'm willing to negotiate a bit, but I can't go below 550 euros per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my situation. 550 euros is getting closer to my budget. However, I still think 525 euros per month would be a fair price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment of 50 square meters in the city center. I hope we can find a middle ground.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hmm, 525 euros is closer to what you're offering, but it's still not what I'm looking for. I'm willing to go as low as 575 euros per month. This is the lowest I can go, considering the location and the fact that it's a new apartment. What's your final offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. Considering the size, location, and unfurnished condition of the apartment, 550 euros per month would be my final offer. I hope we can find common ground.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 550 euros is still not enough for me to cover my expenses. The apartment is brand new and in a prime location, which justifies a higher rent. I'm willing to go down to 590 euros per month, which is my final offer. If you can't agree to this price, I'm afraid we won't be able to reach an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. Considering your expenses and the quality of the apartment, I accept your offer of 590 euros per month. I agree to the price of 590 euros, and we can proceed with the rental agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 590 euros! Let's proceed with the rental agreement. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
